descriptionSet.description: Two western women can be seen in a shop that is selling vegetables, fruit, cheese, tinned products, milk, and so on. A third woman sits at a desk and makes a phone call while the shop keeper in a white jacket packs a box for one of the women customers dressed in a western dress and cap. The second woman customer, wearing a red dress and a hat smiles as she as she points her right hand towards a baby sitting on the floor. She is standing next to the fresh produce section. The baby is sitting next to a basket filled with groceries and holding on to an apple. A dog is balancing on its hind legs and looking towards the apple that the baby holds. Both women hold purses in their left hands.

inscription.text: GUPTA & CO., Manufacturing Perfumers Wholesale dealers in all perfumery raw material. SADAR BAZAR (Below post office) DELHI.
Ask our quotations for: - Bencyl Acetate Diphenyl Oxide Citronellas Terpinol Extra All other Aromatic Chemicals and Essential Oils Colours & Labels
Try our: - Leilla perfumes For Hair olis etc. Royal perfumes For Highclass requirments. Jasmine G. L. For Aggarbattis. Our Specialities: - Bouquet Vera Voilet Flower Otto Mogra Kashmir Flower
BRANCH:- 168, Abdul Rahman Street, (3rd, Flour,) Bombay.
Printed at the Block Printing Press Delhi.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
